name: Nymble
flavorText: It has its third set of legs folded up. When it’s in a tough spot, this Pokémon jumps over 30 feet using the strength of its legs.

previous.name: Spidops
previous.flavorText: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.

next.name: Lokix
next.flavorText: When it decides to fight all out, it stands on its previously folded legs to enter Showdown Mode. It neutralizes its enemies in short order.
